A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.
Warsaw, Polish Centre of Mediterranean Archaeology & University of Warsaw, 2016, 8°, 698 pp., 1 front. coul., nombr. figg. ISBN 978-83-942288-3-5. $95.
36 contributions. - Pp. 19-27: A.Ł, A.O. & I.Z, Włodek on the Nile; - 29-43: Włodzimierz Godlewski. List of publications. - Aegyptus Christiana. - Nubia Christiana.
